tool_description:
Easily create PDF's from csv or json files, or from csv or json strings.
This allows you to very simply create invoices, or other pdf's with tables.
name: Create PDF files from json or csv data.
title: Create PDF files from json or csv data.
tool_name: Create PDF files from json or csv data.

api_list.name: csv2pdf
api_list.description: Create a PDF from a json or csv file, or a json or csv string

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The (public) url to get the csv file from

optional_parameters.name: filename
optional_parameters.description: The filename of the pdf to be created

optional_parameters.name: data
optional_parameters.description: Instead of a url, you can pass the json or csv string to this parameter directly

optional_parameters.name: template
optional_parameters.description: The template for the layout of the pdf.  Available templates are : relax,candy,green,red and pink

optional_parameters.name: separator
optional_parameters.description: A character that is the separator for the csv data.  By default ';' is used.

optional_parameters.name: subtitle
optional_parameters.description:
The subtitle. Following html tags are allowed : ,,
,
,

,
,
.
optional_parameters.default:
Billing to :
John Customer
Branch Street 10
BB 14021 Charmtown


Invoice Date : 04/05/2016
Invoice Nr : 2016.00001

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description:
The title. Following html tags are allowed : ,,
,
,

,
,
.
